name: Captain Velvet Meteor: The Jump+ Dimensions
name_original: Captain Velvet Meteor: The Jump+ Dimensions
description:
Welcome to the Jump+ Dimensions!

Damien's life is flipped upside-down when his family moves him to Japan. A shy boy, he copes with his newfound loneliness with the power of his infinite imagination and creates an imaginary hero named "Captain Velvet Meteor"! Damien sets off on an adventure with his favorite Jump+ heroes in his imaginary world and fights to adjust to his new home and find himself.

Become Captain Velvet Meteor and help Damien conquer his fears in a tactical adventure enjoyable for players of all ages and skill levels!

○ Combat


Experience Damien's struggles living in Japan for the first time as he interacts with his family in his Grandmother's home. Then, dive into the Jump+ Dimensions, the world of Damien's imagination, where he takes part in strategic battles with the heroes or heroines from Jump+ mangas to fight the various sources of Damien’s worries.


Battles take place on a tactical grid and include unique puzzles where you manipulate the environment to meet mission objectives. Damien and the Jump+ characters have unique attacks, including melee, ranged, and charged attacks. Use signature attacks of your Jump+ companions through Power and Assist Combos to unleash massive damage on hordes of enemies!

○ Exploration


The exploration phase allows you to explore Damien's new home in Japan freely. Damien encounters various cultural elements that make him anxious, such as neighbors and his late grandfather’s portrait. To overcome these obstacles, Damien journeys to the imaginary world to become Captain Velvet Meteor, and fight through numerous epic battles. The player’s actions will determine which worlds you end up fighting in.


Born to a French father and a Japanese mother, a shy boy, Damien, moves to Japan so the entire family can live with his Japanese grandmother. However, everything Damien sees and touches in his new Japanese home is full of worrying elements, such as their pet dog growing aggressive from the stress of changing homes, unknown Japanese dishes being served during meals, and encountering unfamiliar insects during bathtime!

Damien, struggling to cope with his new life in Japan, becomes the hero Captain Velvet Meteor and sets off to explore his imaginary world and face his numerous fears. The heroes and heroines from Damien’s favorite Jump+ manga series are joining him during these epic mini-adventures. Can you guide Captain Velvet Meteor and his manga buddies past their challenges and find emotional comfort amidst the cultural turmoil?

Damien, aka Captain Velvet Meteor!

Shy boy Damien is prompted by his move to Japan to become the imaginary hero Captain Velvet Meteor. Teaming up with numerous characters from the hit Jump+ manga series, Damien faces his fears and overcomes his challenges one by one.

Meet the Jump+ heroes and heroines teaming up with Captain Velvet Meteor!


From left to right:
  • The Princess and her holy sword EX from “'Tis Time for "Torture" Princess”
  • Kafka Hibino from “Kaiju No. 8”
  • Slime from “Slime Life”
  • Chrome from “HEART GEAR”
  • Loid Forger from “SPY×FAMILY”
  • Ushio Kofune from “Summer Time Rendering”
  • Chloé Love and Kai Iod from “Ghost Reaper Girl”
  • Gabimaru from “Hell's Paradise: Jigokuraku”



Momo-Pi Game Studio is a small team based in Switzerland. They have members based in Switzerland and Japan and combine their cultural backgrounds and experiences to create unique and original ideas.
